meanings.sent1: The phone autodialled the emergency number when the alarm went off.
meanings.sent2: She set up her phone to autodialled her mom's number with just one tap.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat somehow autodialled the pizza delivery service.
meanings.sent4: His fingers moved so quickly, it was as if they autodialled the numbers on their own.
meanings.sent5: The robot's programming was so precise that it autodialled the correct contact every time.

meanings.sent1: The system autodialled the customer service line as soon as the issue was detected.
meanings.sent2: The smartwatch autodialled the doctor's office in case of an emergency.
meanings.sent3: The car autodialled the mechanic when it sensed a problem with the engine.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock autodialled the radio station for the morning news.
meanings.sent5: The security system autodialled the police station when it detected a break-in.
